## Trove.collateralRatioIsBelowCritical() method

Whether the collateralization ratio is less than the [CRITICAL\_COLLATERAL\_RATIO](./stablecoin-lib-base.critical_collateral_ratio.md) at a given price.

**Signature:**

```typescript
collateralRatioIsBelowCritical(price: Decimalish): boolean;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

price


</td><td>

[Decimalish](./stablecoin-lib-base.decimalish.md)


</td><td>


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

boolean

## Example

Can be used to check whether the protocol is in recovery mode by using it on the return value of [getTotal()](./stablecoin-lib-base.readableprotocol.gettotal.md)<!-- -->. For example:

```typescript
const total = await sfStablecoin.getTotal();
const price = await sfStablecoin.getPrice();

if (total.collateralRatioIsBelowCritical(price)) {
  // Recovery mode is active
}
```
